title: 1972 Summer Olympics
summary: The 1972 Summer Olympics (German: Olympische Sommerspiele 1972), officially known as the Games of the XX Olympiad (German: Spiele der XX. Olympiade) and commonly known as Munich 1972 (German: MÃ¼nchen 1972), was an international multi-sport event held in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany, from 26 August to 11 September 1972.
